module1_temps.comment: raw ADC voltage reading of module1 temp sensors, relative to the car

module2_temps.comment: raw ADC voltage reading of module2 temp sensors, relative to the car

module3_temps.comment: raw ADC voltage reading of module3 temp sensors, relative to the car

module4_temps.comment: raw ADC voltage reading of module4 temp sensors, relative to the car

module5_temps.comment: raw ADC voltage reading of module5 temp sensors, relative to the car

module1_status.comment: Git info for the firmware, on timer, along with temperature and humidity

module2_status.comment: Git info for the firmware, on timer, along with temperature and humidity

module3_status.comment: Git info for the firmware, on timer, along with temperature and humidity

module4_status.comment: Git info for the firmware, on timer, along with temperature and humidity

module5_status.comment: Git info for the firmware, on timer, along with temperature and humidity

vcu_board_data.comment: information on the running vcu firmware and system on-timer

vcu_launchcontrol_countdown.comment: Countdown until the VCU will start launch when in launch mode

vcu_distance_tracker_motor.comment: distance tracking data using motor as speed

vcu_distance_tracker_wheelspeed.comment: distance tracking data using wheelspeed as speed

vcu_lifetime_distance_and_ontime.comment: The total ontime of the vcu and distance

vcu_distance_tracker_vectornav.comment: distance tracking data using vectornav velocity measurement as speed

vcu_slip_info.comment: vcu wheel speed and slip info for traction control and launch control

vcu_set_parameter.comment: The first byte is the target, the last 4 are the value to set

dash_buttons.comment: status of buttons on the dash

dash_board_data.comment: information on the running dash firmware and system on-timer

acu_shutdown_status.comment: information on IMD and BMS shutdown circuit relays, as well as IMD diagnostic info

acu_board_data.comment: information on the running acu firmware and system on-timer

cornernode_fl_shockpot.comment: front left corner node shockpot data

cornernode_fr_shockpot.comment: front right corner node shockpot data

cornernode_rl_shockpot.comment: rear left corner node shockpot data

cornernode_rr_shockpot.comment: rear right corner node shockpot data

cornernode_fl_wheelspeed.comment: front left corner node wheelspeed data

cornernode_fr_wheelspeed.comment: front right corner node wheelspeed data

cornernode_rl_wheelspeed.comment: rear left corner node wheelspeed data

cornernode_rr_wheelspeed.comment: rear right corner node wheelspeed data

cornernode_fl_tiretemp.comment: front left corner node tiretemp data

cornernode_fr_tiretemp.comment: front right corner node tiretemp data

cornernode_rl_tiretemp.comment: rear left corner node tiretemp data

cornernode_rr_tiretemp.comment: rear right corner node tiretemp data

cornernode_rear_brakepressure.comment: front right corner node brakepressure data

signals.name: firmware_version
signals.comment: short hash of the firmware

signals.name: board_on_time_seconds
signals.comment: time in seconds which the board has been powered on and running

signals.name: firmware_on_main
signals.comment: if the compiled firmware was from main branch (1) or not (0)

signals.name: firmware_is_dirty
signals.comment: if the compiled firmware had uncommitted changes (1) or not (0)

signals.name: board_temperature
signals.comment: The ambient temperature at the PCB

signals.name: board_humidity
signals.comment: the relative humidity at the acu

signals.name: APPS1
signals.comment: accelerator pedal sensor 1 ADC reading

signals.name: APPS2
signals.comment: accelerator pedal sensor 2 ADC reading

signals.name: BSE1
signals.comment: brake pedal travel sensor ADC reading

signals.name: STEERING
signals.comment: steering angle sensor ADC reading

signals.name: vcu_apps1_travel
signals.comment: 0 to 100% - a negative value = implaus

signals.name: vcu_apps2_travel
signals.comment: 0 to 100% - a negative value = implaus

signals.name: vcu_bse1_travel
signals.comment: 0 to 100% - a negative value = implaus

signals.name: VCU_GLV_CURRENT
signals.comment: VCU pcb current sense of the glv rail

signals.name: VCU_GLV_VOLTAGE
signals.comment: VCU pcb voltage sense of glv rail

signals.name: VCU_BSPD_VOLTAGE
signals.comment: VCU pcb voltage sense of the BSPD signal to close relay

signals.name: VCU_5V_VOLTAGE
signals.comment: VCU pcb voltage sense of the 5v rail

signals.name: VCU_SDC_VOLTAGE
signals.comment: VCU pcb voltage sense of the shutdown circuit input

signals.name: VCU_SDC_CURRENT
signals.comment: VCU PCB current sense of shutdown circuit

signals.name: VCU_AIN9_VOLTAGE
signals.comment: VCU pcb non specific analog channel

signals.name: VCU_AIN10_VOLTAGE
signals.comment: VCU pcb non specific analog channel

signals.name: vcu_launchcontrol_elapsed_time
signals.comment: time that the launch controller has been executing, in miliiseconds

signals.name: vcu_tractioncontrol_elapsed_time
signals.comment: time that the traction controller has been executing, in miliiseconds

signals.name: vcu_rpm_rear_left
signals.comment: front left wheel speed sensor

signals.name: vcu_rpm_front_right
signals.comment: front right wheel speed sensor

signals.name: VCU_IMD_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: IMD status, high = good

signals.name: VCU_SHUTDOWN_B_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: (UNUSED) Shutdown loop voltage at point D, high = good

signals.name: VCU_BMS_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: BMS status, high = good

signals.name: VCU_SHUTDOWN_C_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: (UNUSED) Shutdown loop voltage at point C, high = good

signals.name: VCU_BSPD_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: BSPD status, high = good (latched)

signals.name: VCU_SHUTDOWN_D_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: (UNUSED) Shutdown loop voltage at point D, high = good

signals.name: VCU_SOFTWARE_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: (UNUSED) VCU heartbeat status, high = good

signals.name: VCU_SHUTDOWN_E_OK_HIGH
signals.comment: (UNUSED) Shutdown loop voltage at point E, high = good

signals.name: VCU_ACCEL_IMPLAUSIBLE
signals.comment: 1 if the accel pedal is implausible, 0 if not

signals.name: VCU_BRAKE_IMPLAUSIBLE
signals.comment: 1 if the brake is implausible, 0 if not

signals.name: VCU_BRAKE_ACTIVE
signals.comment: 1 if the brake is active (above 'vcu_brake_active_threshold')

signals.name: VCU_BSPD_CURRENT_HIGH
signals.comment: 1 if the acc current is above the bspd trip threshold

signals.name: VCU_BSPD_BRAKE_HIGH
signals.comment: 1 if the brake is above the bspd trip threshold

signals.name: VCU_ACCEL_BRAKE_IMPLAUSIBLE
signals.comment: 1 if the accel and brake plausibility is tripped

signals.name: VCU_STATEMACHINE_STATE
signals.comment: 0 = STARTUP, 1 = TS NOT ACTIVE, 2 = TS ACTIVE, 3 = ENABLING INVERTER, 4 = WAIT RTD SOUND, 5=RTD

signals.name: VCU_INVERTER_POWERED
signals.comment: 1 if the inverter is powered, 0 if not

signals.name: VCU_ENERGY_METER_PRESENT
signals.comment: 1 if the energy meter is present, 0 if not

signals.name: VCU_ACTIVATE_BUZZER
signals.comment: 1 if the buzzer is activated, 0 if not

signals.name: VCU_SOFTWARE_OK
signals.comment: currently unused

signals.name: VCU_LAUNCH_CONTROL_ACTIVE
signals.comment: 1 if launch control is active, 0 if not

signals.name: VCU_MAX_TORQUE
signals.comment: max torque setting in Newton-meters

signals.name: VCU_TORQUE_MODE
signals.comment: VCU torque mode setting

signals.name: VCU_DISTANCE_TRAVELLED
signals.comment: distance travelled in current driving session

signals.name: vcu_pedals_settings_MUX
signals.comment: mux signal for VCU pedal threshold information message

signals.name: vcu_target_parameter
signals.comment: look in the vcu.hpp file in the VCU repo for the enum of targets

signals.name: vcu_parameter_value
signals.comment: The actual value that you want to set the parameter to

signals.name: dash_button1status
signals.comment: status of button1 on dash (1 = pressed)

signals.name: dash_button2status
signals.comment: status of button2 on dash (1 = pressed)

signals.name: dash_button3status
signals.comment: status of button3 on dash (1 = pressed)

signals.name: dash_button4status
signals.comment: status of button4 on dash (1 = pressed)

signals.name: dash_button5status
signals.comment: status of button5 on dash (1 = pressed)

signals.name: dash_button6status
signals.comment: status of button6 on dash (1 = pressed)

signals.name: acu_imd_relay_state
signals.comment: Status of the IMD relay as sensed by the ACU: 1 is closed, 0 is open

signals.name: acu_bms_relay_state
signals.comment: Status of the BMS relay as sensed by the ACU: 1 is closed, 0 is open

signals.name: acu_imd_gpio_state
signals.comment: Status of the IMD OKHS output: 1 is OK, 0 is FAULTED

signals.name: acu_bms_gpio_state
signals.comment: Status of the BMS ENABLE output: 1 is OK, 0 is FAULTED

signals.name: acu_imd_pwm_frequency
signals.comment: PWM frequency of the IMD: 10hz on normal operation

signals.name: acu_imd_pwm_duty
signals.comment: duty cycle of IMD: ~5% on normal conditions

signals.name: acu_sdc_voltage
signals.comment: ACU GLV system voltage reading

signals.name: acu_sdc_current
signals.comment: ACU shutdown circuit current reading thru the ACU

signals.name: acu_glv_voltage
signals.comment: ACU GLV system voltage reading

signals.name: acu_glv_current
signals.comment: ACU GLV current reading from the ACU

signals.name: acu_5v_voltage
signals.comment: ACU 5v rail reading

signals.name: acu_3v_voltage
signals.comment: ACU 3v rail reading

signals.name: precharge_state
signals.comment: 0 - standby, 1 - precharging, 2 - running, 3 - error

signals.name: unix_time_ns
signals.comment: Time in nanoseconds since January 1st 1970

signals.name: uint16
signals.comment: Raw unsigned integer with 16 bits

signals.name: temp_C
signals.comment: Temperature in degrees celcius
